name: validate_address
description: Validates a customer address using Google Geocoding. Call this tool after the customer provides their full address. It verifies the address exists and confirms it is within Go-Flow Plumbing's service area (Sonoma and Marin counties). Returns the corrected/formatted address for confirmation.

address.description: The full address as heard from the caller, including street, city, and state or zip code if provided (e.g., '123 Oak Ave, Santa Rosa, CA').
